name: sepp

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: SEPP stands for SATe-enabled phylogenetic placement

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description: The free and opensource java implementation

dependencies.name: pasta
dependencies.description: PASTA (Practical Alignment using SATe and Transitivity)

dependencies.name: py-dendropy
dependencies.description:
DendroPy is a Python library for phylogenetic computing. It provides
classes and functions for the simulation, processing, and manipulation
of phylogenetic trees and character matrices, and supports the reading
and writing of phylogenetic data in a range of formats, such as NEXUS,
NEWICK, NeXML, Phylip, FASTA, etc.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: busco
dependent_to.description:
Assesses genome assembly and annotation completeness with Benchmarking
Universal Single-Copy Orthologs
